title.en: How I Attended an All-Guy's Mixer

altTitles.ja: 合コンに行ったら女がいなかった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Goukon ni Ittara Onna ga Inakatta Hanashi

altTitles.zh: 到了聯誼會上發現連一個女生都沒有

description.en: Tokiwa, a university student, is invited to a three-on-three blind date by Suou, a fellow seminarian. On the day of the mixer, he goes to the pub where they are supposed to meet, only to find a group of handsome men waiting for him...

altTitles.ja: 君のラブを見せてくれ！

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiàng wǒ zhǎnlù nǐ de ài

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？
description.pt-br: Komichi Shijou, a pessoa mais famosa da escola, estava preocupada. Apesar de ser uma artista de mangá de comédia romântica, ela não tinha nenhuma compreensão do "sentimento do amor" e estava presa em uma crise criativa. Um dia, um certo garoto e uma garota aparecem diante dela. Com a chegada deles, a investigação de Komichi Shijou sobre o "amor genuíno" começa...!?

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

altTitles.ja: 姉のともだち

altTitles.en: The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent! 

---
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

altTitles.ja: 三億円事件奇譚 モンタージ

description.en:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen

altTitles.es-la: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei -  La Conferencia de los Clanes Maestros

altTitles.es: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei -  La Cumbre de los Clanes Maestros

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Master Clans Conference Arc
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Master Clans Summit

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Собрание главных кланов

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 師族会議編

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō-sei - Shi-zoku Kaigi-hen

description.en:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
description.es:
La sucesión al los Yotsuba y el compromiso de Shiba Miyuki se anunció a la comunidad mágica. Sin embargo, la Familia Ichijou de los Diez Clanes Maestros presentó una objeción. Mientras tanto, la atmósfera en la Preparatoria de Magia, el aire de respeto por los hermanos Shiba, que habían ocultado sus identidades, está siendo evitado, y Tatsuya y Miyuki se están aislando. ¡Un nuevo episodio que describe la nueva relación entre los dos ha sido adaptado a un cómic por el nuevo Takeda Hazumi!  
  
Adaptación de los volúmenes 17-19 de la novela ligera original.

title.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encount

altTitles.ja: 勝利の女神：NIKKE すいーとえんかうんと

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encount

altTitles.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

description.en:
In this manga, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. A loose comedy in which the main character N102 works as a maid at a maid café called "Maid For You", where Cocoa and Soda work too!

The first official manga based on the popular mobile game *Goddess of Victory: NIKKE* with over 25 million downloads worldwide!
description.ja: この世界ではニケたちは平和に過ごす─。Nが、アニスが、ココアとソーダが働く「メイド･フォー・ユー」でメイドとして働くことに…！一生懸命働く姿やゲームではあまり見ることができない服装などに癒やされること間違いなし！

altTitles.ja: ダイヤモンドの功罪

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

altTitles.ja: 六弦少女

description.en:
"My dad is a famous guitarist. Sometimes, he shows up out of the blue, and teaches me how to play guitar.

Mom hates Dad and the guitar, and she takes it out on me... But I won't let that stop me. Even if I'm scolded, even if I'm bullied - so long as I have this, I'll be just fine."

A stirring and emotional one-shot by Wakatake Abishi about one girl's drive for rock that never stops ringing!
description.vi: Bố là một tay rock guitar nổi tiếng. Thỉnh thoảng bố tự nhiên xuất hiện, dạy tôi chơi guitar. Nhưng mẹ ghét bố, ghét cả guitar. Dù vậy, niềm khao khát của tôi vẫn không thể dừng lại. Mặc cho có bị trêu chọc hay la mắng, chỉ cần tôi có thứ này.

description.en: My first ever manga and is a joke manga will only get updated whenever i feel like it and will only consist of one panel every chapters

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en:
Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first, Shoto is hesitant towards it, but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there, he becomes a fan of the game.

Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.

This is a story about Digimon, and the world.
description.ja:
諦め癖がついて中々カードバトルに勝てない少年・風真照人は、幼馴染みの城之崎有紗の誘いでフルダイブゲーム〝デジモンリベレイター〟の世界へと足を踏み入れた。

メタバース空間・ラクーナで臨場感溢れるカードバトルを楽しむことが出来るリベレイター。このゲームに最初は抵抗があった照人だったが、リアルなデジモンとの触れ合いを通じて次第に夢中になっていく。

そして、野生のデジモン・プテロモン達との出会い。暴走するNPCとのバトル。様々な出会いが、照人達の運命の歯車を大きく動かしていく。

これは〝デジモン〟と〝世界〟を巡る物語だ。

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

altTitles.vi: Hijiri-kun Chỉ Muốn Sống Thanh Liêm

description.en: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

description.en: Ria's regular, boring weekday turns into something much less so after she gets taken hostage by a criminal, Jace, who happened to rob a store at a nearby block. Now she has to find a way to deal with the situation and see where it gets them both.

title.en: Tensei-saki wa Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag wa Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.ja: 転生先は悪役令嬢の父親でした～可愛い娘の死亡フラグは全部折ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei-saki ha Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag ha Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.en: I Was Just Reincarnated As The Villainess's Father ~I'll Snap All Of My Cute Daughter's Death Flags~

description.en: Ryuichi, a 44-year-old single father, gets into a traffic accident while protecting his high school daughter Mizuho, ​​who ran away from home after an argument. After losing consciousness and accepting his death, he finds himself in the body of a young man he had never seen before. While panicking, he finds a girl who looks exactly like Mizuho when she was a child, and as he sorts out the situation, it seems that he has been reincarnated as the father of the game's villainess…!?
description.ja: 44歳のシングルファザーの龍一（りゅういち）は口論の末、家を飛び出した女子高生の娘・瑞穂（みずほ）をかばい、交通事故に遭ってしまう。意識が遠のき死を覚悟した後に目覚めると、見知らぬ若い男性の姿になっていた。動揺する中、小さい頃の瑞穂そっくりな少女がいて、状況を整理していくと、どうやらゲームの悪役令嬢の父親に転生してしまったようで……!?

title.en: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan

altTitles.pt-br: Nura - A ascensão do clã das sombras

altTitles.th: นูระหลานจอมภูติ

altTitles.ja: ぬらりひょんの孫

description.en:
Rikuo Nura is descended from Nurarihyon, Grand Master of the spirit world, but appears to be just a normal kid. He usually just wants to live peacefully as a human, but when his friends and allies are in trouble, his spirit blood boils, and he transforms into Nurarihyon to wipe out evil! A new concept story combining spirits and chivalry! A piquant, gallant ghost action story!  


---
description.ru: Монстры живут среди нас! Не верите? Спросите у Рикуо, для него это более чем реально. Ведь его дом битком набит монстрами всех видов и размеров, а всё потому, что дедушка у Рикуо — сам Нурарихён, предводитель всех монстров. Вот только Рикуо — монстр лишь на четверть и хоть и является наследником столь значительного титула, отказывается заниматься типичной для монстров деятельностью, то есть пугать людей, а иногда и перекусывать ими… Нет, он ходит в школу, самоотверженно помогает людям, иногда даже слишком, но стоит пробить полночи, и кровь нелюдей даёт о себе знать. Ведь ночью пробуждается он, Нурарихён Третий — будущий повелитель всей нечисти, уже вселяющий страх в сердца людей и ведущий за собой орды монстров.

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

altTitles.ja: 大ダーク

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

title.en: The Prince and His Mischievous One

altTitles.es: El principe y su luz de luna negra

altTitles.zh: Wangzi yu Ta de Hei Yueguang

description.en:
Lanka Norman, the youngest Emperor ever to reign, was betrayed by Jan Gray. With the grace of God, Lanka was returned to the time when he was six years old. To avoid the same disasters recurring in this new life, little Lanka is determined to stay away from that terrible guy this time- all to survive! “But wait… Isn't the kid being bullied over there, Jan Gray? Damn, he came over! Is it too late to escape?!”  
  
-SPANISH-  
Después de la sucesión de Lanka, fue traicionado por Jian Grey, su amigo de la infancia, convirtiéndose en el emperador más efímero del imperio. Afortunadamente, Dios le hizo volver a cuando él tenía seis años. ¡El pequeño Lanka, quien comienza de nuevo su vida, esta vez está decidido a mantenerse alejado de ese tipo terrible y mantenerse vivo! …¿Eh? ¿El niño que está siendo intimidado no es Jian Grey? ¡Oh Dios, me está viendo! ¡¿Es demasiado tarde para correr?!

description.ar: لقد قتلت من قبل الخونة وبعد أن عدت . قررت هذه المرة أن أكون صداقة معهم . . لأنه إذا أصبحت صديقه لهم ، فلن يقتلوني . لكن " هل يمكنك فقط السماح لي بالذهاب عندما ينتهي الأمر لقد أملت رأسي وسألت ، لكن العيون المحدقة بي قد تعمقت بعطش مجهول " ماذا يمكنني أن أفعل ؟ ليس لدي أي نية لترككِ تذهبين . " ردود الفعل هذه غريبة نوعا ما ؟ "
description.en: Arabella is a forgotten outcast princess who vomits blood whenever she moves. After being killed during the rebellion against the oppression of the imperial family which inherited the dragon's blood, she returns to the time before her 20th birthday. Realizing that she must survive until her 25th birthday in order to stop the regression cycle, Arabella decides to look for a way to cure her illness, even if it means seeking answers from the rebel forces themselves.
description.fr: Arabella est la princesse oubliée et maladive qui vomit du sang dès qu'elle bouge. Elle revient après avoir été tuée lors d'une rébellion contre l'oppression de la famille impériale dirigée par celui qui a hérité du sang du dragon. Elle doit survivre jusqu'à son 25e anniversaire pour s'assurer que sa régression est terminée. Arabella décide de trouver une réponse auprès des rebelles afin de prolonger sa vie.
description.it: Arabella è una principessa dimenticata che vomita sangue ogni volta che si muove. Dopo essere stata uccisa durante la ribellione contro l'oppressione della famiglia imperiale, ritorna al tempo prima del suo ventesimo compleanno. Rendendosi conto che deve sopravvivere fino al suo 25° compleanno per fermare il ciclo di regressione, Arabella decide di cercare un modo per curare la sua malattia, anche se questo significa cercare risposte dalle stesse forze ribelli.
description.ko:
움직이면 피를 토하는 잊혀진 찬밥 황녀 아라벨라. 
드래곤의 피를 이어받은 황실의 압제에 맞서 일어나는 반란 사건 때 죽임을 당한 후 회귀한다. 
자신이 25살의 생일까지 살아남아야 회귀가 끝난다는 것을 알게 된 
아라벨라는 생명 연장을 위해 반란군에게서 답을 찾기로 결심한다.
description.pt: Arabella é uma princesa esquecida que vomita sangue sempre que se move. Depois de ser morta durante a rebelião contra a opressão da família imperial, ela retorna à época anterior ao seu 20º aniversário. Percebendo que deve sobreviver até seu 25º aniversário para interromper o ciclo de regressão, Arabella decide buscar uma forma de curar sua doença, mesmo que isso signifique buscar respostas das próprias forças rebeldes.
description.vi:
Arabella là một cô công chúa bị lãng quên, luôn nôn ra máu khi di chuyển. Một cuộc nổi loạn đã diễn ra để chống lại sự áp bức bóc lột của hoàng gia. Về sau khi bị giết chết liên tiếp, cô phát hiện ra rằng quá trình trở về quá khứ sẽ chỉ kết thúc nếu cô sống sót cho đến sinh nhật thứ 25 của mình
.
Arabella quyết tâm tìm ra câu trả lời từ phe nổi dậy để kéo dài sự sống.
description.zh-hk:
阿拉貝拉，是一位因為體弱容易吐血而被遺忘受冷落的公主。

在受繼承龍族血統的皇室壓迫而發生的叛亂事件的時候，遭遇死亡之後復活。

明白自己到25歲的生日復活就結束的阿拉貝拉，決心為了延續生命從叛軍那裡尋找答案。

description.en:
Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

title.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!

altTitles.ja: 陰キャの僕に罰ゲームで告白してきたはずのギャルが、どう見ても僕にベタ惚れです

altTitles.en: An Introvert's Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!
The Gal Who Was Meant to Confess to Me as a Punishment Game Has Apparently Fallen in Love with Me

altTitles.zh-hk: 因懲罰遊戲才向陰角的我告白的辣妹，怎麼看都已經完全迷戀上我了

altTitles.ko: 아싸인 내게 벌칙 게임으로 고백해 온 갸루가 아무리 봐도 나한테 반한 것 같다

altTitles.ru: Девушка, которая должна была признаться мне в качестве игрового наказания, очевидно, влюбилась в меня

altTitles.pl: Introwertyczne wpadki podrywowe: Ta Gyaru zakochała się we mnie po uszy!
Gal, która miała mi wyznać miłość w ramach gry z karą, najwyraźniej się we mnie zakochała.

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya no Boku ni Batsu Game ni Kokuhaku Shitekita Hazu no Gyaru ga, Doumitemo Boku ni Betahore Desu

description.en:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it is—and Yoshin knows it. How’s an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isn’t actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way she’s acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in love—for real, this time?!

---
**Links:**
- Official Video Manga - [YouTube](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0zfSjyskgIUZdlu7xyxLAv956kN32dP6) (Chapters 1-3, With voice acting)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/an-introvert-s-hookup-hiccups)
description.ja:
**陰キャ×清楚ギャル、罰ゲームから始まるピュアラブコメ!!**

クラス内カーストトップの清楚ギャル・茨戸七海に罰ゲームで告白されて付き合うことになった陰キャ男子・簾舞陽信。 しかし罰ゲームのはずが、七海は陽信にガチ惚れしているようで…？
description.pl: Kiedy piękna Nanami Barato wyznaje miłość Yoshinowi Misumai, wydaje się to zbyt piękne, by mogło być prawdziwe! Tylko, że tak jest - i Yoshin o tym wie. Jak taki introwertyczny facet jak on ma zachować zimną krew, skoro wie, że to tylko wyzwanie? Jeszcze bardziej zastanawiające jest to, że pomimo jej krzykliwego wyglądu, ta rzekoma gyaru nie jest tak dobra w kontaktach z facetami! Być może jest to idealna okazja dla tego nieśmiałego faceta, aby zebrać się na odwagę i powiedzieć "tak" tej nieśmiałej dziewczynie. Tak zaczyna się ich nowe, wygodne życie porannych spotkań i ręcznie robionych lunchów. Rzecz w tym, że sądząc po jej zachowaniu, Nanami zakochała się w nim po uszy! Czy ta dwójka może odkryć swoje uczucia, a może nawet zakochać się w sobie - tym razem naprawdę?!
description.pt-br: Barato Nanami, uma versão atenuada da garota no topo da hierarquia da escola, perdeu um jogo de cartas e agora tem que confessar a um cara de sua classe como punição. Misumai Youshin, que é um solitário sem amigos, foi o cara escolhido, mas ele sabe da punição! Deveria ter sido uma punição do jogo, mas será que Nanami vai desenvolver sentimentos por Youshin…?

description.en: It’s hard dating someone who won’t give you the time of day. Su-ae Shim knows that better than anyone, having dated her indifferent boyfriend, Minu Kang, for years. She sometimes wishes she could be more like her charismatic stepsister, Ra-im, who seems to have it all. But life takes a turn for the weird when Su-ae discovers Jellypop, a sentient flip phone, in her locker. Jellypop has a lot to say about her love life, especially as Su-ae drifts further away from Minu and finds herself running into Minu’s friend, Eunhyeok. Add to the mix a growing suspicion that Minu and Ra-im might be more than friends, and Su-ae might need a miracle to navigate the ups and downs of high school romance!

title.en: Ken to Mahou to Gakureki Shakai

altTitles.ja: 剣と魔法と学歴社会 ～前世はガリ勉だった俺が、今世は風任せで自由に生きたい～

altTitles.en: Sword, Magic and Academic Society ~ I Was a Diligent Student in My Previous Life, but in This Life I Want to Live Freely and Leave the Wind in My Sails

description.en:
Boku is reincarnated as "Allen", the third son of a noble family, in a different world of swords and magic, which he had longed for. However, this other world is a world where "academic background," which he was bound to in his previous life, is more important than anything else! 

"I am no longer bound by my academic background. In this life, I will live freely and let the wind blow my way!"

He decided to do as e pleased, but for some reason e became the center of attention everywhere he went..?!

This is the start of a painful fantasy in which you can enjoy your freedom in a different world!

Skylar has a secret hobby - taking photos of his crush, Chan-il. But when Cirrus stumbles upon Skylar's cloud storage with its impressive collection of Chan-il's photos, things escalate pretty quickly. At first confident his secret is safe with Cirrus, Skylar continuously finds himself in compromising situations, making him question Cirrus' true motives
description.uk:
У Ханиля є таємне хобі - фотографувати своє нерозділене кохання, Чаниля. Але коли Хьонун натикається на хмарне сховище Ханиля, з його вражаючою колекцією фотографій, ситуація досить швидко загострюється.
Чи збереже Хьонун секрет? Що він задумав?
description.pt-br: Skylar tem um hobby secreto - tirar fotos de sua paixão, Chan-il. Mas quando Cirrus se depara com o armazenamento de nuvem de Skylar com sua impressionante coleção de fotos de Chan-il, as coisas começam a andar muito rapidamente. A princípio confiante de que seu segredo está seguro com Cirrus, Skylar continuamente se encontra em situações comprometedoras, fazendo-o questionar os verdadeiros motivos de Cirrus.

description.en:
"You’re its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

altTitles.ja: 転生コロシアム～最弱スキルで最強の女たちを攻略して奴隷ハーレム作ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Coliseum ~Saijaku Skill de Saikyo no Onna-tachi o Koryaku Shite Dorei Harem Tsukurimasu~
Tensei Coliseum ~Saijaku Skill de Saikyo no Onna-tachi wo Koryaku Shite Dorei Harem Tsukurimasu~

altTitles.en: Reincarnation Coliseum ~Using The Weakest Skill To Defeat The Strongest Women And Create A Slave Harem~
Reincarnation Colosseum - Using the Weakest Skills in Order to Defeat the Strongest Women and Create a Slave Harem

altTitles.id: Reinkarnasi Colosseum - Menggunakan Keterampilan Terlemah untuk Mengalahkan Wanita Terkuat dan Membuat Harem Budak

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生競技場～用最弱技能擊敗最強的女人們打造奴隸後宮～

altTitles.es-la: Coliseo de Reencarnación - Utilizar las Habilidades Más Débiles para Atacar a las Mujeres Más Fuertes y Crear un Harén de Esclavas

altTitles.ko: 전생 콜로세움 ～최약 스킬로 최강의 여자들을 공략해 노예 할렘 만듭니다～

altTitles.ja: 転コロ

description.en: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami​ Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!
description.es:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.
description.id: Siswa sekolah menengah Kouji Mikagami, memiliki nilai pelajaran biasa dan kemampuan atletik biasa, tapi "dia tidak banyak kalah" dalam bermain game, entah kenapa saat bermain game dia tiba-tiba dipanggil ke dunia lain. Sebuah cerita yang dimulai dengan apa yang terjadi. Meskipun mengkonsumsi 1.000 batu ajaib tingkat tinggi untuk melakukan pemanggilan, fakta bahwa ia hanya memiliki "Skill Copy" kemampuan terlemah membuat marah pendeta, dan akhirnya Mikagami dijadikan budak gladiator di Colosseum. Mikagami yang kesal dengan situasi yang tiba-tiba menyadari bahwa situasinya seperti dalam game, dan dengan kemampuan terlemahnya dia akan membuat budak harem di dunia lain.
description.es-la:
Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.
Fue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue "Copiar", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.
Debido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.

altTitles.ja: ヤンキー高校にお嬢様

description.en:
Kiryuuin Yuri, a rich young lady, transfers to Mitsuya Private High School, a den of delinquents.

Her goal is to meet real delinquents and have heated one-on-one fights, like those in the delinquent manga she adores. However, contrary to her ideal, the reality is that she is surrounded by "trash" who are too presumptuous to even be called delinquents...

Bullies who rule the class, voyeurs who infest the train to school, abusive breeder in the neighborhood. 

A new refreshing action series begins as this lovely young lady beats up the scums in order to reach the top─!
description.ja: 悪名高い超不良高校に転校してきたのは可憐なお嬢様！？

title.en: Fuufu de Itonamu Monster Farm – Mezase, Mattari Slow Life

altTitles.en: Monster Farm Run by a Couple

altTitles.ja: 夫婦で営むモンスターファーム ～目指せ、まったりスローライフ～

description.en: A lovey-dovey tamer life of an animal-loving newlywed couple ♥ Haito and Lina, a newlywed couple, purchase the full-dive VR game “Free Frontier Online.” The purpose of play is to mofu mofu as many monsters as you like! ! ! The two, who are unable to keep pets due to animal allergies, come up with the idea that they can interact with fluffy animals as much as they want in the game, so they start the game as tamers.I thought I started with the purpose of relaxing with the monsters, but before I knew it, I ended up being more active than the real monsters…! ? The slow life of interaction surrounded by monsters has begun♪

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

title.en: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.ja: 私の胎の中の化け物

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Tai no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.vi: Con quái vật trong tử cung của tôi

description.en:
***Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.***

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. 

However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

title.en: Uso Kareshi Demo Ii Kara Tonikaku Shitai Mashiro-chan

altTitles.ja: 嘘彼氏でもいいからとにかくシたいましろちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: Usokareshi Demo Iikara Tonikaku Shitai MASHIRO-chan

altTitles.en: Mashiro-chan Wants to Do It Even If It's with a Fake Boyfriend

description.en:
Mashiro Naomoto wants to have a taste of romance and even get to try lewd things, now that she has become a high school student.

However, she has low self-esteem and as a result of lacking confidence in herself, she began to think that it's probably impossible for her. Right at that moment, to her surprise a handsome male classmate named Oosagi-kun confesses to her. Mashiro starts to suspect that his confession must be some sort of punishment game, but her own desire to do lewd stuff wins over it and as a result, she does the opposite and makes a move on him... it's a case of sexual desire winning over suspicion?!

This is a romcom where a high school girl's libido will run wild!!

(Source: Comic-Meteor)

---

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomattaaaaan/status/1851462156996551019) (Preview) *Posted with the caption: Doushitemo Sukebe Shitai JK no Manga Kakimashita (どうしてもスケベしたいJKの漫画描きました) "I drew a manga about a high school girl who wants to do perverted stuff no matter what"*
description.ja: 高校生になったのだから恋愛、さらにはＨなことをしてみたい直本ましろ。だが、自己肯定感が低く、自分に自信がないため、どうせ無理だろうなと思っていたところ、なんとクラスメートのイケメン男子・大鷺くんから告白される。絶対に罰ゲームだろうと告白に疑心暗鬼になるましろだったが、Ｈなことをしたいという欲求が勝ったため、逆に大鷺くんに迫るが…性欲は疑惑に勝る!?　性欲強めJKの暴走ラブコメディ!!
description.pt-br:
Mashiro Naomoto quer experimentar o romance e até tentar coisas pervertidas, agora que se tornou uma estudante do ensino médio**.

No entanto, ela tem baixa autoestima e, por falta de confiança em si mesma, começou a pensar que isso provavelmente seria impossível para ela. Nesse momento, para sua surpresa, um colega bonito chamado Oosagi-kun se declara para ela. Mashiro começa a suspeitar que a confissão dele seja algum tipo de jogo de punição, mas seu próprio desejo de fazer coisas pervertidas fala mais alto, e, como resultado, ela toma a iniciativa com ele... seria esse um caso de desejo sexual vencendo a desconfiança?!

Essa é uma comédia romântica onde a libido de uma garota do ensino médio vai correr solta!!

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

description.en: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.
description.es:
Las pruebas y adversidades de un padre soltero, que un día se encuentra con la reencarnación de su difunta esposa, que murió una década antes.  
  


---

Links  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yayu_murata)
description.es-la: Nijima Keisuke es un hombre asalariado, vivía felizmente junto a su esposa y a su hija, hasta que un día su esposa fallece y él se derrumba. Siendo ahora un padre soltero, tuvo que esforzarse más por su hija pero perdía el camino y su estilo de vida se volvió muy deplorable, hasta que un día aparece una niña diciendo ser la reencarnación de su esposa y se propone ayudarlo para cambiar y corregir su lamentable situación actual.
description.pt-br: As provações e tribulações de um pai solteiro, que um dia encontra a reencarnação de sua falecida esposa.

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)
- [Official LN (JP)](http://www.fujimishobo.co.jp/sp/201803nonbiri/)
- [Alternative Raw](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/nonbiri_noka/)
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

title.en: Tensei shita Onna Mafia wa Isekai de Heibon ni Kurashitai - Asashin Ikka no Hakushaku Reijou desu ga, Denshi to Akuma na Danchou ga Tsukimatottekimasu

altTitles.ja: 転生した女マフィアは異世界で平凡に暮らしたい

description.ja: シェリング伯爵家の令嬢ローゼルは、自分が「マフィア」だったという前世の記憶があった。表向きは「商家」を装っているシェリング家。実は「国家公認の暗殺者一家」であり、ローゼルも暗殺の依頼をこなしていく日々を送る。安全なスローライフを送りたいローゼルだが、責任感と面倒見のよさで国同士の揉め事に巻き込まれていくはめに…！しかも依頼協力のため訪れた騎士団長「アルフレード」と「クラウス」に次第に溺愛されて…！？転生した女マフィアに平和な日々は訪れるのか？

altTitles.ja: To LOVEる -とらぶる- ダークネス

description.en:
Rito Yuuki continues to be caught in over-the-top perverted scenarios, now uncensored. The alien Deviluke sisters - Lala, Momo, and Nana - still use their unique abilities in an attempt to grab Rito's love confession. Momo, in particular, has a vision: a harem of women all in love with Rito, with Momo herself in the center. After all, if everyone has an equal share of Rito, everyone wins - at least, she thinks.  
  
As she enacts this plan, the former alien mercenary Yami, aka Golden Darkness, struggles between her former life as a killer and her current life on Earth. Things get complicated when Mea, a girl with powers similar to Yami's, becomes interested in Rito. Just who is this new enemy?

title.en: I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim’s Strongest, the Namgung Clan

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

altTitles.ja: ××しないで！月峰さん。

description.en: Hidaka Akira is a high school student who loves solitude. He avoids the crowds in his class and decides to eat alone, but there is someone who disturbs his peace. It is Tsukimine Chiyo, the girl at the highest level in the school hierarchy, a girl who is absolutely beautiful. Tsukimine called Akira and asked him to do his "usual thing". What kind of "normal" did they mean, and why were her clothes off...?
description.ja:
「オレはただ…静かに過ごしたいだけなのに――…」

両親の転勤のおかげで念願の一人暮らしをはじめた高校生・陽高旭。孤独を愛する彼は学校でもトイレで一人ぼっちメシをキメていた。しかし、ささやかな平穏はひとりの少女…月峰千夜によって破られる。どこからともなく旭の元へ現れる千夜は彼の気弱さにつけこみ無茶を要求してきて!?
description.pt-br: Hidaka Akira é um estudante do ensino médio que adora a solidão. Ele evita as multidões em sua classe e decide comer sozinho, mas há alguém que perturba sua paz. Trata-se de Tsukimine Chiyo, a garota do mais alto nível na hierarquia da escola, uma garota absolutamente linda.

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja: TOUGH 龍を継ぐ男

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shi Yi Chang An: Ming Yue Ji Shi You

description.en:
In order to fulfil her mission of bringing peace to her homeland, the Uyghur Princess Amelia travels to Chang'an and marries Emperor Dezong of Tang's ninth prince, Li Qian. While she had been considered very capable in her homeland, the complex and foreign customs of the Tang court are something else entirely; and although she had not expected love in a political marriage, the sheer disinterest and arrogance of her husband is very hard to handle, no matter how capable and handsome he may be. Securing peace between the Uyghur Khaganate and the Tang Empire is not going to be easy, especially with the rebellion taking place in Tang.  

 ---

[Official English Subtitled Donghua](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBakWosU0sfhqdN5TFbbITb7Bm93T3-PW)
description.pt-br: Na esperança de unir Uighur e Tang, a Princesa Amelia deve se casar com o 9º príncipe de Tang. No entanto, Amelia está longe de ser uma princesa comum: antes de conhecer o Imperador, ela troca de lugar com sua pobre empregada para ter mais liberdade! Mas parece que o futuro marido dela não é muito tipico: ao chegar ao palácio, ele não aparece para conhecê-la! Que futuro espera esse casal que nada pensa sobre o casamento e qual será o destino de seus países trancados na guerra?!

title.en: The Villainess Captured the Grand Duke

altTitles.es-la: Capturé el corazón del gran duque siendo una villana

description.en:
In this novel, my favorite character died.
After being rejected by the female lead and losing his emotions, he could no longer use his abilities,
and as he became weak, the North collapsed.
Even his body was never to be found,
but the novel only depicted the happy ending of the protagonists.

And I possessed the body of the villainess "Schuer" from that novel.

"Rather, I'll make him regain his emotions before he meets the female lead."

Thus, I left for the North.

"Grand Duke, can you hold my hand just once?
Or maybe a signature. I'll keep it as a heirloom."
"If you want my signature, you too should sign and stamp here, my Lady."
"What's this?"
"A marriage certificate."

Huh?

"You can just act you usually do.
It seems like your behavior is
is somewhat getting on my nerves."

...Did I win the jackpot?

altTitles.ja: キリングバイツ

description.en:
People have been created that are human-animal hybrids, and powerful businesses bet on the outcome of their duels. College student Nomoto Yuuya's casual acquaintances ask him to drive them around to pick up girls one day, which he soon finds out means by force. The girl they kidnap is an animal-human hybrid named Hitomi, who slaughters all of them except Yuuya. Hitomi is a honey badger, which has been called the most fearless of all animals. Now Hitomi is assigned to stay with Yuuya, for his protection!
Killing Bites are underworld duels between human-animal hybrids. One beast who knows no fear will fight in this animalistic world full of fear and insanity. This ultimate battle of the beasts will shock you to your core!

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%AD%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0%E3%83%90%E3%82%A4%E3%83%84)
description.ru:
Один учёный создал существ которые являются гибридом человека и животного, и богачи ставят ставки на исход их поединков. Случайные знакомые просят студента колледжа Номота Юя покатать их по городу, и ближе к вечеру он узнает, что они просто хотели подобрать и изнасиловать девушку. Девушка, которую они похищают оказывается “гибридом” которую зовут Хитоми, которая убивает всех кроме Юи. Хитоми является гибридом барсука, который был назван самым бесстрашным из всех животных. Теперь Хитоми остаётся с Юи, для его защиты!  


---

**Links:**  
- [Shinya Murata's Twitter](https://twitter.com/jojojon)  
- [Sumita's Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_kazasa)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20213)
description.pt-br: Pessoas estão sendo criadas como híbridos animal-humano e batalham entre si, empresas poderosas apostam no resultado de seus duelos. A história inicia com um cara que se meteu no rapto de uma garota contra a sua vontade, todos menos ele acabam mortos pela garota, que ele descobre ser um dos híbridos, competindo com outros de sua raça em duelos mortais envolvendo complexas apostas. Sem aviso prévio, ele acaba obrigado a se tornar o parceiro da garota.

altTitles.ja: 美人女上司滝沢さん

description.en: Kouta Takeda is a young office worker, who at the entry level at XOX Corporation is put under the direct supervision of Kyouko Takizawa, a stunning and voluptuous woman with a fearsome reputation at the company as an inflexible and cruel boss, but Takeda has the privilege of finding out that Takizawa is no iron lady, and that she's no stranger to kindness where it's dispensed.
description.ja: こんな上司と働きたい♪　Twitter発、美人で巨乳な女上司4コマ！ 新卒で入った僕の会社の上司・滝沢さんは、美人で巨乳でちょっぴり○○！？　Twitterで話題になった後ニコニコ静画にて連載化された美人女上司さん4コマがたわわに書籍化!!
description.pt:
Kouta Takeda, que acabou de começar a trabalhar na XOX Corporation, conhece sua nova chefe, uma linda mulher de seios grandes chamada Kyouko Takizawa.

title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

altTitles.th: เจ้าสุนัขตัวโตรังแกเจ้านายอีกแล้ว

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."
